channel.title: course on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in course on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: teaching material
item.description: supervisions I am currently supervising five msc theses in Econometrics and three msc theses in Data Science for Marketing Analytics at Erasmus School of Economics this year I am second assessor of three msc theses in Econometrics, three msc theses in Data Science for Marketing Analytics and five bsc theses in Econometrics at Erasmus School of Economics in the past few years I supervised three msc theses in Econometrics (on mixed-type data clustering methods and latent dirichlet allocation), three msc theses in Data Science for Marketing Analytics (on supervised machine learning methods), and eighteen bsc theses in Econometrics (on Cavicchia, Vichi and Zaccaria (2022), Adachi and Trendafilov (2018), Vichi and Kiers (2001) and Bluszcz (2016)) at Erasmus School of Economics
